title: S3 Ep3: Betting on the Lord
itunes:title: Betting on the Lord
description: An experiment in Haiti shows that people take more risks in the presence of religious images, even if there is less chance they will win. Emmanuelle Auriol tells Tim Phillips about the challenges that belief in a higher power presents for economic development.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
